text: John Williams Rose (born February 23, 1965) is an American politician and businessman. He is the U.S. Representative for Tennessee's 6th congressional district since 2019. He was the Commissioner of Agriculture of Tennessee and was president of Boson Software, LLC.http://www.ajlambert.com/jared/stry_jwr.pdf In January 2025, Rose announced his candidacy for Governor of Tennessee in the 2026 gubernatorial election. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman John Rose official U.S. House website *John Rose for Congress Category:1965 births Category:United States representatives from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Tennessee Category:Living people
title: John Rose
